TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit VerificationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class VerificationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class VerificationAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定義無障礙網頁開發規則的中繼資料屬性。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute of a Web content accessibility rule.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體類別會定義可驗證的 Web 內容的存取範圍規則。An instance of the class defines a Web content accessibility rule that can be verified. 如需有關 Web 內容可及性準則的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on Web Content Accessibility Guidelines, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 定義的執行個體所需的資訊最少包括：The minimal amount of information required to define an instance of a includes: - 驗證規則是表示指導方針。A guideline that the verification rule represents. 建構函式設定中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 方針的檢查點。A checkpoint of the guideline. 建構函式設定中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 檢查點優先權。A checkpoint priority. 建構函式設定中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - A所屬的列舉值，表示應該是規則的報告層級。A enumeration value that represents the reporting level that should be rule belongs to. 建構函式設定中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 驗證規則為 true 時，會報告訊息。A message that is reported when the verification rule is true. 建構函式設定中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. 建立執行個體時，可以指定的驗證規則的選擇性屬性：Optional properties of the verification rule that can be specified when creating an instance: - A列舉值，表示應該如何解譯的驗證規則。A enumeration value that represents how the verification rule should be interpreted. 建構函式設定中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - A列舉值，表示用來測試驗證規則的條件式運算式中的運算子。A enumeration value that represents the operator in the conditional expression used to test the verification rule. 建構函式設定中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 協助工具參考方針 URL。An accessibility reference guideline URL. 建構函式設定中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 條件的值，用來表示條件運算式的右邊。A conditional value representing the right side of a conditional expression. 建構函式設定中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 條件的屬性，用來表示條件運算式的左邊。A conditional property representing the left side of a conditional expression. 建構函式設定中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. 中繼資料可以是定義的類別、 屬性和索引子的宣告。The metadata can be defined class, property, and indexer declarations. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates using the class. 在驗證中繼資料定義中，使用的指導方針會是"WCAG，「 Web 內容可及性方針和 「 ADA"行動不便人士 Act 指導方針的美國人。In the verification metadata definition, the guidelines used are "WCAG," the Web Content Accessibility Guideline, and "ADA," Americans with Disabilities Act Guidelines. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 使用檢查點可為"1.1"和"1194.22(a)"WCAG 與 ADA，分別用於確保非文字項目是否有文字對等的檢查點。The checkpoints used are "1.1" and "1194.22(a)" for WCAG and ADA, respectively, checkpoints for ensuring that a text equivalent exists for non-text elements. 套用至`ImageText`屬性，代表另一個屬性的對等文字又稱為`ImageProperty`。The is applied to the `ImageText` property that represents the text equivalent of another property called `ImageProperty`. 如果`ImageText`屬性未設定、 網頁可及性驗證將會傳回訊息 「 映像缺少文字對等用法。 」If the `ImageText` property is not set, the accessibility verification will return the message "The image is missing a text equivalent." [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute/cs/VerificationAttributeExample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute/vb/VerificationAttributeExample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式的類別指定最低限度的定義驗證規則所需的資訊。The constructor of the class specifies the minimal amount of information needed to define a verification rule. 下列的預設值會假設執行個體：The following default values for the instance are assumed: - 屬性設定為。The property is set as . - 屬性設定為。The property is set as . - 屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 若要指定屬性的值超過其預設值的上述清單中，使用或建構函式多載。To specify values of the properties in the preceding list beyond their default values, use the or constructor overloads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `conditionalProperty`參數是用來評估的驗證規則的條件運算式的一部分的其他屬性。The `conditionalProperty` parameter is another property that is used as part of the conditional expression to evaluate the verification rule. 比方說，如果規則參數然後相關的屬性所指定`conditionalProperty`不得為空字串 ("")。For example, if the rule parameter is then the related property specified by `conditionalProperty` must not be an empty string (""). 下列的預設值會假設執行個體：The following default values for the instance are assumed: - 屬性設定為。The property is set as . - 屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). 若要指定屬性的值超過其預設值的上述清單中，使用建構函式多載。To specify values of the properties in the preceding list beyond their default values, use the constructor overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性時，會設定執行個體已建立，而且是必要。The property is set when the instance is created and is required. 定義上的 Web 內容可及性準則[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)屬性會指定為指導方針的數字，後面接著句號 （.） 後面跟著檢查點數目。For the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines defined on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) the property is specified as a guideline number followed by a period (.) followed by a checkpoint number.

summary.span: 取得條件運算式的左邊，用做驗證協助工具檢查點的一部分。

span.span: Gets the left side of a conditional expression used as part of the verification accessibility checkpoint.
The left side of the conditional expression.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性時可以進行設定執行個體建立時，但是是選擇性的。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果您使用建構函式未採用`conditionalProperty`參數，預設值是空字串 ("") 會使用。If you use a constructor that does not take a `conditionalProperty` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used. 屬性為右側或值，用於驗證協助工具檢查點的條件式運算式。The property is the right side, or value, of a conditional expression that is use in the verification of the accessibility checkpoint. 使用指定的條件運算式的左側。The left side of the conditional expression is specified with the .
